backend/main.mo: Motoko actor managing stock items with add, update, remove, and query operations stored in a Map.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, related files, components, tests, and confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing major frontend files involved in stock register, matrix layout, print, and export features.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining color variables, theming, and base styling including dark mode.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React component rendering the StockRegisterPage.
frontend/src/features/stock-register/com: UI component for month/year/day navigation using Select controls and month switching buttons.
Toolbar providing Add, Print, Export actions and a layout selector for row vs matrix view.
Renders an editable or print-only stock register table with row inputs and delete actions. Handles number input parsing and triggers row-change and delete callbacks.
frontend/src/features/stock-register/dat: Provides timezone‑safe date parsing, formatting, comparison, and month/day utilities for YYYY‑MM‑DD strings. Used to avoid Date object timezone issues.
frontend/src/features/stock-register/exp: Builds CSV content for stock register exports in row or matrix layout and triggers a file download. Formats numbers, dates, and handles UTF‑8 BOM for Excel.
frontend/src/features/stock-register/gri: Contains utility math functions for total quantity, closing stock, number parsing, and number formatting. Ensures consistent numeric handling across the grid.
frontend/src/features/stock-register/mon: Generates day‑by‑day matrix data from register rows and extracts unique item names. Also builds CSV rows for matrix export.
Displays a matrix table with days as rows and items as grouped columns, showing stock metrics per day. Supports print mode and handles empty datasets.
frontend/src/features/stock-register/pri: Renders a printable view of the stock register in either row or matrix layout. Displays title, month, year, and generation date.
frontend/src/features/stock-register/sta: Provides React state management for year, month, and focused day filters. Exposes setters for updating filter values.
frontend/src/features/stock-register/Sto: Main stock register screen handling filters, row/matrix layouts, item operations, printing, and exporting.
frontend/src/features/stock-register/typ: Defines TypeScript interfaces for register rows, filters, and report layout types. Used throughout stock‑register features for typing.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity using React Query. Recreates and invalidates dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity loading.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, light/dark theme CSS variables, global styles, and extensive print styling rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering.
frontend/src/types/xlsx.d.ts: Type declarations for the xlsx library, defining workbook, worksheet, cell structures, utilities, and read/write functions.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, radii, fonts, plugins, and content paths using theme variables.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata including requirements, features, known issues, and high-level architectural notes.
